p: There are only a few available antiviral treatments, which have limited efficacy on COVID-19 at present. The latest Chinese guideline emphasized that convalescent plasma(CP) therapy was an emergent treatment for serious COVID-19 cases [ 1]. Generally, CP has been applied to improve the survival rate of patients with a variety of viral epidemics, including SARS, MERS, influenza, Ebola virus disease, etc [ 2]. More recently, COVID-19 cases have also shown improvement to a certain degree after CP therapy in China [ 3]. In order to take full advantage of this promising treatment, there are still several critical problems need to be clarified.
